text: @SouthernOracle4 Instead he said, "it's only a dream, it's a beautiful day, enjoy it."

passages.full_quote: <used>Instead he said, "S</used>o how the hell do we get out of this place?"

passages.full_quote: "Even <used>if it's only a dream, it's a</used> pretty horrible idea," said Mella, "destroying a world just to make a bypass."
